statements: SELECT * FROM DataAuditTable;
SELECT data_audit_id, audit_type FROM DataAuditTable;
SELECT audit_date, data_table_name FROM DataAuditTable;
SELECT * FROM DataAuditTable WHERE audit_type = 'data_insert';
SELECT data_table_name, audit_date FROM DataAuditTable ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataAuditTable ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT data_audit_id, audit_type FROM DataAuditTable WHERE audit_type = 'insert';
SELECT * FROM DataAuditTable WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT audit_type FROM DataAuditTable;
SELECT data_audit_id, data_table_name FROM DataAuditTable WHERE data_table_name LIKE '%transaction%';
SELECT * FROM data_audits;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM data_audits;
SELECT breach_id, affected_table FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, compliance_status FROM data_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_audits WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, compliance_status FROM data_audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT breach_description FROM data_breaches WHERE affected_table = 'customers';
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM data_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_reports;
SELECT report_id, auditor_name FROM data_audit_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_requirements FROM privacy_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, auditor_name, audit_comments FROM data_audit_reports WHERE auditor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, affected_records FROM data_breaches ORDER BY breach_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, auditor_name, audit_comments FROM data_audit_reports WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM privacy_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT breach_date, affected_records FROM data_breaches WHERE affected_records > 1000 ORDER BY breach_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, auditor_name, audit_comments FROM data_audit_reports WHERE report_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT source_name, data_type, location, last_updated FROM data_sources WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action, details FROM data_audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, action, description FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT source_name, data_type, location FROM data_sources WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, address FROM user_data WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' OR full_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*), action FROM data_audit_logs GROUP BY action HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM DataAudits;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM DataAudits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, affected_records FROM DataBreaches WHERE affected_records > 1000;
SELECT notification_id, breach_id, notification_date FROM BreachNotifications WHERE notification_method = 'Email';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description, regulation_penalty FROM PrivacyRegulations;
SELECT * FROM DataAudits ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT auditor_name, audit_status FROM DataAudits WHERE audit_status='Pending'
SELECT * FROM PrivacyRegulations WHERE regulation_penalty > 5000 ORDER BY regulation_name ASC
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, affected_records, breach_description FROM DataBreaches WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT ar.record_id, ar.audit_id, ar.table_name, ar.record_status, da.auditor_name FROM AuditRecords ar JOIN DataAudits da ON ar.audit_id = da.audit_id ORDER BY ar.table_name ASC
